original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE b.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-01-08 03:03:48' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-25 14:04:43' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=89 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-02 10:21:04' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation<=705 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-28 23:56:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-02 10:04:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-20 20:47:27' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-09 13:24:28' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2 AND (CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-01-08 03:03:48' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-25 14:04:43')

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.AnswerCount <= 4 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 12) AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 89) AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-02 10:21:04'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation <= 705 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-28 23:56:00' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-02 10:04:41')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 20:47:27' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 13:24:28'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3E4.OwnerUserId)
